original_title: The next leg of the fastest transatlantic ocean liner’s journey is underway | CNN
article_summary:
Historic SS United States Funnels to Become Museum Centerpiece Before Sinking as Artificial Reef

The iconic funnels of the SS United States, an American maritime legend, will be removed and used as a centerpiece for a new museum in Florida, before the ship is sunk to create the world's largest artificial reef. The museum aims to preserve the ship's history and inspire future generations.</s>
